1.content: Who is it and how did it happen?
1.title: At the hospital

11.content:
Robert went to the hospital for a standard surgical procedure and when he woke up he found out that he had accidentally been given a experimental gender change procedure.

They stopped as as soon as they realised but it was to late as now Robert has fully functioning female representative organs, natural female hips, butt and genitalia.

Robert was fine but shocked at been told this and that once his body levels out he'll be producing chemicals of a normal 18 year old female and his body will start to adapt to the changes.

They said that his body is very physically fit, healthy, strong and capable and they are impressed with how his changed body parts have turned out.

They informed him the body parts are all completely natural due to experimental nono bots been given orders to change the parts they changed but they are dead and will desolve now.

He was given some jeans and knicker as well as information on periods and he was sent packing.

Robert got to his apartment that he shares with his friend but his friend is gone for the next two weeks visiting family and friends.
11.title: Robert William Wallace, 18 years old

111.content:
The first thing Robert did when he got bot was get in the shower, he got undressed and get in under the water he immediately started feeling better.

Although he started thinking about what he's going to wear over the coming weeks and how to keep it quiet from his friend.

And that he'll have to be careful not to let him know about what has happened as it's embarrassing and Robert doesn't want anyone to know....
111.title: Continue

1111.content:
Over the next two weeks Robert read up on his problem and although he wasn't the smartest person he has a remarkable memory and can retain information.

He spent the two weeks buying jeans that looked like his old one's and female boxer shorts and knickers.

It's been two weeks now...

I woke up in the morning and felt cramps he immediately knew it was his period put lucky he had been wearing a pad for two days in anticipation of what was coming.

Robert felt like shit but kept it together... Especially after walking into the kitchen and seeing his friend had returned and was making a coffee.
1111.title: Continue

12.content:
Harvey got in a car accident and was rushed to hospital and after intensive surgery he was injected with experimental stem cells.

The stem cells are designed to heal the body but someone programed them wrong and as they healed you they also fully charged your body from male to female.

All they did was change your Y cromosone to a X and they your body did the rest...
12.title: Harvey Elliott Appleby, 19 years old

121.content:
I was in a medically induced coma as my body changed and my flat mate and best friend is at my side as I changed.

It took a week to fully complete the change and my mother and father where informed about my treatment and about the accident but I can't be charged back.

My mother sorted everything all the legal documents out for me as I was slowly coming back around.

My name is officially Hayley Elise Appleby now and no longer Harvey Elliott Appleby.

Everything else is the same and I'm my parents biological child and daughter, even university it's all the same, same course, same apartment and same tutors it's just now I'm a girl not a boy.

I eventually wake up from my coma and as you expected I was shocked and scared but I was compensated for the mistake but I eventually came to the conclusion that I just had to get on with life....
121.title: One

1211.content:
I've been living with my friend and studying at university as Hayley for a month now.

Really the only difference is I have to wear a bra and I go to the gym on different days as I go to female only session and I've started kick boxing and apparently I'm a tomboy.

But everything is the same and people treat me the same especially Kyle my flat mate and best friend.
1211.title: Continue

12111.content:
In reality this apartment belongs to Kyle as his parents bought it for him and he let's me rent out the spare bedroom.

I also have a part time job at a strip/lap dancing club... I only started it two weeks ago.

All the girls as really nice as I'm one of the youngest members of staff, it pays will and I get to keep all my tips.

I usually wear jeans and a top behind the bar so no one can mistake me for the girls working the floor.

Kyle have come in a few times usually to pick me up after work because I'm still waiting for my updated driving licence to come back.
12111.title: One

choices: You pay the rent and try to save
Kyle suggested another way to pay jokingly (you think about it)
121111.content:
It came to the end of the month and I had a little money left enough for rent but that's it.

But I really need some more clothes as I really don't have many.
121111.title: Continue

choices: It can remain a dream them Kyle
We should get on with it
1211112.content:
After been in your room for a few hours in your vest and knickers, you finally get up and knock on Kyle's bedroom door.

"come in Hayley"

You walked in and sat on his bed and said "where you serious about what you said" what? "about the sex" no, I was only joking Hayley!.

Well hypothetically what would be the deal? Kyle is taking completely off guard and said "hmmm well it would be plain sex no strings attached and you could live here rent and bill free".

Ok then well I guess....
1211112.title: Kyle suggested another way to pay jokingly (you...

154.content:
When Michael woke up in the hospital bed after a accident at school his mother was at his side looking at him.

Michael could see himself in the window next to his bed and luckily nothing appeared different about him.

His mom then processed to tell him that after the accident at school where a ball hit him between his legs the damage was major and she agreed to do anything to save her sons life.

She said "well Michael they had to chop off your genitalia to save your life and the surgeon formed a virgina between your legs instead" what mom! That's not it son, the surgeon also injected you with a liquid medication to balance your vital signs, but they injected you with the wrong one.

Wrong one? "yeah they accidentally gave you the one for girls not boys and the medication that has little nanotechnology in it has well given you a womb and internal female reproductive organs and has fully formed your genitalia into female equipment".

But I still look the same mom? "I know Michael, but your hips have already changed shape and the rest of your body will follow in time as you as a girl are only just started puberty".

This can't be mom, what am I going to do?
154.title: Michael John Francis, 13 years old

1541.content:
A week later

Michael returned home and finally got out of the hospital... In the week he has got used to using the toilet like a girl would and also wearing knickers.

He went straight to his bedroom once he was back in the house and just laid on his bed and chilled thinking of what might happen in the coming future.

His face although never the boyish is definitely more towards the feminine side then masculine now...
1541.title: One

15411.content:
Michael although he doesn't like wearing panties or knickers he finds them more comfortable then male male boxer shorts and less abrasive.

Anyway Michael got used to life like this he even had to periods pass and go although in the two months since the change he has realised his body is changing and catching up with his puberty.

He has recently found that he has had to start wearing a bra because his nipples are becoming very sensitive and his chest obvious.

His mom his started calling him Megan and even arranged everything according.
15411.title: Continue

154111.content:
Once the paperwork came his mom had named him Megan Elizabeth Dannelle Francis.

Michael was shocked at how girly his name is and a little annoyed at the name but he just got on with it and as he can't do anything till he turns 21 regarding changing his name.

His mom measured him for his first bra and it turned out he's already a small Acup nothing amazing but his mom is exited about buying her child his first bra.

He warned him that she expects him to wear a bra every day from now on...
154111.title: Continue

info.brief_description: This storyline is about a person young guy who lives in a apartment with a friend.
info.description:
The individual involved is just starting university and is intelligent and physically fit and healthy.

He somehow is changed into a female version of himself after something happening by accident while been treated at a local hospital and has to live with consequences and his friend at the apartment they both own together.
